_header: Harkeneth all of Christian faith / What Matthew here to us sayeth
_description: Gospel ‘In vigilia Epiphanie’, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HErkneþ alle of Cristene feiþWhat Matheu here to vs
                    seiþ…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…He for his aȝeyn buggyngeTo his endeles blisse vs
                    bringe. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
In vigilia Epiphanie secundum Matheum / Defuncto Herode Ecce Angelus
                        domine et cetera (f. 173rc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
